sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-row>
    <el-form-item style="margin-top: 20px;" prop="name">
      <el-input v-model="name" placeholder="请输入工具名称">
        <template slot="prepend">
          名称
        </template>
      </el-input>
    </el-form-item>

    <el-form-item prop="image">
      <el-input v-model="image" placeholder="请输入工具图标链接">
        <template slot="prepend">
          图标
        </template>
      </el-input>
    </el-form-item>

    <el-form-item style="margin-bottom: 40px;" prop="describe">
      <el-input v-model="describe" :rows="4" type="textarea" placeholder="请输入功能介绍" />
    </el-form-item>

    <el-form-item v-if="describe !== ''">
      <Tip><span v-html="describe" /></Tip>
      {{describe !== ''}}
    </el-form-item>

  </el-row>
</template>

<script>
import Tip from '@/components/Tip'

export default {
  name: 'General',
  components: { Tip },
  props: {
    name: { type: String, default: '' },
    image: { type: String, default: '' },
    describe: { type: String, default: '' }
  }
}
</script>
